snippet: In a further thinning of their ranks, operators at the Crown Plaza hotel in Manhattan were told in January they were being laid off. But the employees are hoping for a bigger severance package.
abstract: Phone operators at Crowne Plaza Times Square hotel in Manhattan are pushing for better severance deal amid threat of impending layoffs; hotel plans to shut its seven-person operator department; New York Hotel and Motel Trades Council, representing them, says there are 497 hotel telephone operators still working in some of New York City's larger hotels.
lead_paragraph: In a further thinning of their ranks, operators at the Crown Plaza hotel in Manhattan were told in January they were being laid off. But the employees are hoping for a bigger severance package.
